        Parameters:

      • isTwitterUser

        public static java.lang.String isTwitterUser(java.lang.String query)
                                      throws twitter4j.TwitterException
        Returns true if a given a given search query is associated with a verified account
        Parameters:
        query - The name/entity that we are searching (i.e. "Chance the Rapper" or "Bobby Flay")
        Returns:
        A boolean value determing if the query is associated with a verified account or not.
        Throws:
        twitter4j.TwitterException

      • getTrendingTopics

        public static java.lang.String getTrendingTopics()
                                          throws twitter4j.TwitterException
        Returns the top 5 trending topics on Twitter in the United States
        Returns:
        A list of the trending topics in order from most to least popular
        Throws:
        twitter4j.TwitterException
